Status Function: We are waiting for the customer to submit payment for their order.
Process That Sets The Status: Manually set when a new order that is waiting for a wire transfer or check payment is received and reviewed.
Comments: When an order is first received, it will always be set to New, which will allocate stock to the order. If the order payment is Wire Transfer or Check, you would set the status to Awaiting Payment, which automatically de-allocates stock from the order while we are waiting for the payment.

Status Function: The order is waiting for an admin to review and approve the order.
Process That Sets The Status: This status is always set for new orders received from the website.
Comments:
Stock will ALWAYS be allocated to an order when this status is set.
Repurposed WooCommerce's standard 'On Hold' status with custom label

Status Function: The order has been released to be produced and shipped.
Process That Sets The Status: Manually set after a new order has been received and reviewed. Automatically set by the OM when all SKUs in a production batch needed for the order come out of production.
Comments: A new phone order can be safely set to Process when it is created.

Status Function: Parts needed for the order are currently in production.
Process That Sets The Status: Automatically set by the OM system when one or more SKUs needed for the order are currently in production.

Status Function: The order is ready to be shipped. Waiting for the shipping label to be created in Ordoro.
Process That Sets The Status: Automatically set by the OM when a shipping batch is created.
Comments: Stock will always be decreased when this status is set, which will guarantee that no order can be shipped out without stock being properly decreased. Pre-authorized Credit card and PayPal payments are immediately captured when this status is set!

Status Function: The order has been shipped and is fully processed.
Process That Sets The Status: Automatically set by ShipStation when an order has been shipped.
Comments: Stock will always be decreased when this status is set, which will guarantee that no order can be shipped out without stock being properly decreased. Warning! If, for some reason, an order status is changed from Shipped to Awaiting Payment (which would be highly unusual), stock will be de-allocated from the order!

Status Function: The capture of the customers credit card has been declined. We are waiting for the customer to solve the problem.
Process That Sets The Status: Set by the shipper when the credit card capture failed.
Comments: A declined email message will be automatically sent to the customer.

Status Function: The order is on hold. Usually because we are waiting for the customer to confirm detials.
Process That Sets The Status: Set by an admin any time that an order needs to be held for some reason.
Comments: A new phone order can be safely set to Hold when it is created.

Status Function: PayPal sets this status when it is waiting for the customers payment process to finish.
Process That Sets The Status: PayPal may set this status if it is verifying a payment.
Comments:
Note that this status cannot be manually selected. It is only used by the PayPal plugin.
PayPal uses standard wc-pending status; this is PayPal's internal terminology

Status Function: Used to schedule the processing and shipping of an order at a future date.
Comments: A new phone order can be safely set to Scheduled when it is created.

Status Function: Set if the CC or PP payment process failed for some reason.
Process That Sets The Status: Automatically set by Stripe or PayPal if the payment fails or is declined.

Status Function: Used to indicate that the order is at the quoting stage.
Order has been cancelled and is not to be processed.
Comments: Note that no payment adjustments or refunds are automatically done by WC. That process is managed manually.

Status Function: Used by the Phone Orders for WooCommerce plugin while orders are being created.
Process That Sets The Status: Used by the Add/Edit Order process to create draft orders.

Status Function: Completely deletes an order from the system.
Process That Sets The Status: Automatically set by WC when the Move to Trash function is used on the order page.
Comments: Never use the Move to Trash function on the WC order page to delete an order. Doing so will NOT adjust stock levels!

Process That Sets The Status: This status is not currently used.
